articles.author: Jason Gale
articles.title: Cancer Patients Receiving Covid mRNA Shots Show Dramatically Longer Survival - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The same Nobel-winning mRNA technology that helped curb the Covid-19 pandemic may be poised to transform cancer care.
articles.content:
The same Nobel-winning mRNA technology that helped curb the Covid-19 pandemic may be poised to transform cancer care.
Patients with advanced lung or skin cancer who received a Covid-19 mRNA vaccine … [+233 chars]

articles.title: Samsung takes on Apple’s Vision Pro with new Galaxy XR headset - TechCrunch
articles.description: Galaxy XR costs $1,800, nearly half the price of the Vision Pro.
articles.content: After months of speculation, Samsung has finally unveiled its Galaxy XR headset to take on Apple’s Vision Pro. The headset runs on Google’s Android XR operating system and Qualcomm’s Snapdragon XR2+ … [+2756 chars]
